author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Fairway is calling! EVERYBODY’S GOLF Hot Shots is available now on Nintendo Switch! Play now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/everybodys-golf-hot-shots-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 
 
Step onto the fairway and into every match, every mode, and every challenge that awaits you on the green. Enjoy with a variety of unique characters and courses in online and offline matches for both single and multiplayer modes. 

#EVERYBODYSGOLFHOTSHOTS #NintendoSwitch 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: EVERYBODY'S GOLF HOT SHOTS – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch
